name: No way to stop!
description:
NOTE: YOU CAN CHANGE THE Y AXIS INVERSE OR SENSITIVITY IN IN-GAME SETTINGS!

Welcome to 3d platformer with cute robot cleaner!

3d platformer with one big level!

Controls (keyboard + mouse):

Escape - Pause
Mouse - Look
Mouse scroll wheel - Zoom in/Zoom out
WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
Left Shift - Sprint (hold)
E - respawn at last checkpoint

Team:
yourlx - programmer, sfx, UI.
De1mossss - artist (textures, models).

Game was made in 2 days. We don't have much time, as result we having a problem with lightning and some uncritical bugs.

Third party resources:
one sound from here: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/high-tech/
most of sounds was from freesound.org (with non commercial licensing)
font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bebas+Neue?subset=latin&preview.text=test message&preview.text_type=custom

Made for "JUICE JAM" (2022)
by yourlx & De1mossss.
